document.full_text: the senate has passed legislation to lengthen chicago's school day and year. now the question is whether teachers will welcome more instructional time, demand more pay or both.
document.title: chicago news cooperative: in springfield, a week of change in education
lines_and_colors: the senate has passed legislation to lengthen chicago's school day and year. now the question is whether teachers will welcome more instructional time, demand more pay or both.
